idea:
DAB Research Labs LLP is an Indian Startup Incepted on 4th Sept 2017 and focussed on medical technology Solutions. We represent manufacturers of medical devices and diagnostics all over the world – from the largest to the smallest companies. Dr. Labs advocates for the highest ethical standards, timely patient access to safe and effective products, and economic policies that reward value creation, to help achieve healthier lives and economies.
We are a team of professional Individuals providing high-quality Product design, Smart Application and business process solutions across verticals with expertise in the Healthcare and Medical devices. Our work is driven by a culture of care and a feeling of responsibility towards our client’s success.
Our processes are rooted in a passion for providing workable and customized solutions and empower our people and clients to deliver and achieve more. We truly understand the needs of global companies and the complexities that arise while doing business, and provide solutions that meet international standards.
For more information, please visit our website at www.DrLabsPro.com.
name: DAB RESEARCH LABS LLP

idea: Graphnile provides data-driven services using Machine Learning algorithms. Our team is comprised of Data Scientist, Economist, journalist, Mathematician etc. We provide the services and research on Electoral Analytics, Economics Research, and Political Risk Analysis and Public Policy Research. We sensitized to the political risks as well as ensuing contingencies and recognize the importance of a coherent service for our clients which are directed at the threats arising from the political, social, operational and security landscape in International markets. Currently no Electoral Analysis company is using economics data and public policy research for electoral analytics. We have developed and developing machine learning tools for Electoral Analytics.
name: GRAPHNILE CONSULTANCY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a E-commerce gifting portal catering to Home decor, Living and Gifting products for Indian customers of Tier-I, Tier-II and Tier-III cities.  We are sourcing our products from Indian manufacturers/vendors dealing in Indian Handicrafts and tribal products.  We are also importing products from abroad in these for gifting items.
Indian craftsmanship is something we all should be proud of but sadly in the recent years of globalization, they have not been receiving the recognition they deserve. So we decided to get such unique and indigenous products on-board from various corners featuring the brilliance of such expertise. To name a few, we have Dokra art, paper machie products, Madhubani paintings, metal crafts, and leather products of highest quality. We also have internationally acclaimed world class products of Cross, Police and Sheaffer. Our range of products for the kids are made through German technology and duly certified by confirmative of European certification.
So you see, we have made sure that you need to look no further.
100% assurance guaranteed:
Quality check is done on a first-hand basis by our experts and hence we can boldly claim that our products come with a tag of 100% quality assurance. You will have no regrets!
For more details, visit our website www.deluxora.com
name: DELUXORA PRIVATE LIMITED
